spec_data.Name: perl-Tk-Stderr
spec_data.Description:
This module captures that standard error of a program and redirects it
to a read only text widget, which doesn't appear until necessary. When
it does appear, the user can close it; it'll appear again when there is
more output.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:57:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Capture standard error output, display in separate window for Perl::Tk
